TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubscriptionManager extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: SubscriptionManager is the application interface to SubscriptionController and provides information about the current Telephony Subscriptions.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int javaReference, valuetype Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership transfer) cil managed

To be added.
Docs.summary: To be added.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the SubscriptionInfo(s) of all embedded subscriptions accessible to the calling app, if any.
Docs.value:
Sorted list of the current embedded SubscriptionInfo records available on the device which are accessible to the caller.
  • If null is returned the current state is unknown but if a OnSubscriptionsChangedListener has been registered OnSubscriptionsChangedListener#onSubscriptionsChanged will be invoked in the future.
  • If the list is empty then there are no SubscriptionInfo records currently available.
  • if the list is non-empty the list is sorted by SubscriptionInfo#getSimSlotIndex then by SubscriptionInfo#getSubscriptionId.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get active data subscription id.
Docs.value: Active data subscription id if any is chosen, or SubscriptionManager.INVALID_SUBSCRIPTION_ID if not.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Requires Permission: android.Manifest.permission#READ_PHONE_STATE READ_PHONE_STATE or that the calling app has carrier privileges (see TelephonyManager#hasCarrierPrivileges).
Docs.value: the current number of active subscriptions. There is no guarantee the value returned by this method will be the same as the length of the list returned by #getActiveSubscriptionInfoList.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: the maximum number of active subscriptions that will be returned by #getActiveSubscriptionInfoList and the value returned by #getActiveSubscriptionInfoCount.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the SubscriptionInfo(s) of the currently active SIM(s).
Docs.value:
Sorted list of the currently SubscriptionInfo records available on the device.
  • If null is returned the current state is unknown but if a OnSubscriptionsChangedListener has been registered OnSubscriptionsChangedListener#onSubscriptionsChanged will be invoked in the future.
  • If the list is empty then there are no SubscriptionInfo records currently available.
  • if the list is non-empty the list is sorted by SubscriptionInfo#getSimSlotIndex then by SubscriptionInfo#getSubscriptionId.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get both hidden and visible SubscriptionInfo(s) of the currently active SIM(s).
Docs.value: Sorted list of the currently available SubscriptionInfo records on the device. This is similar to #getActiveSubscriptionInfoList except that it will return both active and hidden SubscriptionInfos.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetSubscriptionOverrideCongested (int subId, bool overrideCongested, long expirationDurationMillis);

Docs.param: the subscriber this override applies to.
set if the subscription should be considered congested.
the duration after which the requested override will be automatically cleared, or 0 to leave in the requested state until explicitly cleared, or the next reboot, whichever happens first.

the network types this override applies to. If no network types are specified, override values will be ignored. TelephonyManager#getAllNetworkTypes()

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetSubscriptionPlans (int subId, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> plans);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetSubscriptionPlans(int32 subId, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> plans) cil managed

abstract member SetSubscriptionPlans : int * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> -> unit override this.SetSubscriptionPlans : int * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> -> unit

Docs.param: the subscriber this relationship applies to. An empty list may be sent to clear any existing plans.
the list of plans. The first plan is always the primary and most important plan. Any additional plans are secondary and may not be displayed or used by decision making logic.
Docs.summary: Set the description of the billing relationship plan between a carrier and a specific subscriber.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetSubscriptionPlans (int subId, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> plans, long expirationDurationMillis);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetSubscriptionPlans(int32 subId, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> plans, int64 expirationDurationMillis) cil managed

abstract member SetSubscriptionPlans : int * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> * int64 -> unit override this.SetSubscriptionPlans : int * System.Collections.Generic.IList<Android.Telephony.SubscriptionPlan> * int64 -> unit

Docs.param: the subscriber this relationship applies to. An empty list may be sent to clear any existing plans.
the list of plans. The first plan is always the primary and most important plan. Any additional plans are secondary and may not be displayed or used by decision making logic.
the duration after which the subscription plans will be automatically cleared, or 0 to leave the plans until explicitly cleared, or the next reboot, whichever happens first.
Docs.summary: Set the description of the billing relationship plan between a carrier and a specific subscriber.

to-be-deprecated this API is a duplicate of EuiccManager#switchToSubscription(int, PendingIntent) and does not support Multiple Enabled Profile(MEP). Apps should use EuiccManager#switchToSubscription(int, PendingIntent) or EuiccManager#switchToSubscription(int, int, PendingIntent) instead.
